rmmProcess.title: How does our RMM service work?
rmmProcess.subtitle: A simple and transparent process to protect your IT infrastructure

steps.title: Initial Assessment
steps.description: We evaluate your current infrastructure, identify equipment, servers and critical points in your network.
steps.details: Our team performs a complete hardware and software inventory, detecting vulnerabilities and areas for improvement.

steps.title: Agent Installation
steps.description: We deploy NinjaOne agents on all your devices without interrupting your operations.
steps.details: Silent process that takes minutes per device. Compatible with Windows, Mac and Linux.

steps.title: Configuration & Policies
steps.description: We set up custom alerts, patch policies and performance thresholds.
steps.details: We define which events require immediate attention and automate security updates.

steps.title: 24/7 Active Monitoring
steps.description: Your infrastructure is constantly monitored from our operations center.
steps.details: We detect and resolve issues before they impact your business. Average response time of 15 minutes.

steps.title: Reports & Continuous Improvement
steps.description: You receive monthly reports with your IT health status and improvement recommendations.
steps.details: Full visibility of resolved incidents, applied patches and performance trends.

rmmProcess.guarantee: No commitment • Free evaluation • Results in 48 hours
